== Info Leak Scanner ==


The Info Leak Scanner searches through your [[Webanwendung|webapplikation]] and generates a report on possibly unintentionally detailed information – e.g. on the structure of the application or software version in use – which should not be made public. Findings should be rectified as quickly as possible.

* [[Content-Management-System-Found/EN|CMS]]
* [[Email-Address-Found/EN|EMAIL]]
* [[JavaScript-Vulnerability/EN|JAVASCRIPT]]
* [[Plugin-Found/EN|PLUG-IN]]
* [[Phone-Number-Found/EN|TELEFONNUMMER]]
